title: SLRR by Birger v4 NEW Street Legal with mods
description:
....::::SLRR by Birger v4::::....
   <a href=" http://www.slrr-sweden.nu" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.slrr-sweden.nu</a>
Swedish Street Legal modding forum

a modpack including cars, engines, tracks, better overall realism and cranked up graphics + more!
all credit except for making the pack goes to all the modders involved!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[General info]
This modpack is stable for me. Hopefully for you too!
However, by adding your own mods to it, you risk making it unstable.
Most addon cars and tracks should work fine. The mod uses "LE2MWM".
Starting money are now changed from 20 000$ to 50 000$ to make the carreer mode 
possible with the new more expensive cars.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[KNOWN BUGS]
1:
If you have activated the ENB function. The screen will be all blurry at startup 
and when you return from a minimized window. Just hit shift+insert to shut it 
off and re-activate it again while on the track. The problem is only in menus and garage.

2:
The Audi RS4 Avant doesn't come with a complete engine

3:
The steering wheel of the Old Beetle is somewhat skewered

4:
While loading Valo City in carreer mode, you might need to minimize your window real quick and then
maximize it again to get it in to the track. This problem only occurs in carreer mode for some reason.

5:
The Jeep doesn't come with all the rear windows when you buy the whole vehicle. The Audi RS4 Avant will
miss its engine when you buy it. I suggest you throw in the Audi 3.0 TFSI V6!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[NEW CARS]
All the original cars are removed from the ingame vehicle catalog. 
You won't find them taking up space at the dealer either.
IF you would see them, it might be because of you adding a new car mod. 

The new cars are:

BMW M3 E46
BMW M5 E39
Mercedes Benz C63 AMG
Chevrolet Avalanche
Mitsubishi Lancer EVO VI
Mitsubishi Lancer EVO X
Volkswagen Old Beetle
Audi RS4 Avant (updated since v3)
Pontiac GTO '69 (+ "the judge")
Nissan Skyline GTR-V R35
Honda Civic EK9
Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8-12
Mercedes Benz 190E
Dodge RAM SRT-10
Subaru Impreza STi
Chrysler PT Cruiser
Dodge Viper SRT-10
Honda NSX
Buick Regal

All cars will not be obtainable by the dealers. However they are all available through the vehicle
category in the catalog. Cars that might mess up night races will not be "bots", Unfortunately a lot
of Old beetles will race in the first race club. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[New cheats]

    timemachine - a day of ROC
    fastpromotion - get you to next team
    ilikecheating - enable cheat keys

[Keyboard]
Keys are active only on tracks!

1 - Time speed down
2 - Time speed up
3 - Time PauseUnpause
4 - Rotate camera mode
0 - Mirror (it's very early alpha)

TAB - ShowHide OSD
B - Look back
M - ShowHide Map

Numpad 0-9 - Pneumatic suspension

F9 - Free Camera
PgUp, PgDn, Numpad-, Numpad+ - Free camera control

[CHEAT KEYS]
F6 - Manual repairpaint Car
F10 - Repair, tank nitroflip car
F11 - Get new car (you carrier car will be teleport to the carlot
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Rivals]
Some tracks require one or more saved cars to work as intended. I included a few.

Here's how to do your own!

Drag Track:
You need to create a car and save it as DragCar for this track to work. 
The saved car will be used by the computer AI. (Default drag tuned old beetle)

Coast:
If you want to race against Rivals (optional thanks to the selector). 
You need to save cars with names Coast, Coast1, Coast2 etc. (I included those, overwrite with new
save if you want to change it.

Akagi track:
If you want to race with a rival, save a car named AkagiCar (Default JDM tuned Honca Civic EK9)

Nevada Freestyle dift track:
If you want to race with other cars. Create and save cars as nevabot1, nevabot2 etc. (Default Swedenring EVO6)

Top gear test track:
Save a car as STIG if you want to choose the opponent car. Default is Skyline GTR-V R35
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENB] - requires high end gpu! (NVIDIA is recommended)
This modpack includes a graphics mod. It is off by default. If you want to activate it, do like this:
In the slrr folder, open enbseries.ini
In the "[GLOBAL]" section, type 1 instead of 0 at "UseEffect=0"
Hit save and close.
Activate or de-activate ingame using shift+insert (It will now be active ingame by default.

But first!
Create a custom setup in NVIDIA control panel for the Street Legal application.
(Manage 3D settings -> Program Settings -> Add Street legal and do the following:
Antialiasing gamma correction - ON
Antialiasing Mode - Override any application setting
Antialiasing Setting - 32x CSAA
Antialiasing Transparency - 8x (supersample)

Ingame video settings for "good" graphics
Make sure you have  color depth set to "32" in the games video settings
1024ptx should be activated on texture details and shadow details
play around with the sliders as you like. Detail settings all the way up ofcourse :)
Let "Loading primary" stay on default.

If you want a higher resolution than you can select ingame. 
Use MWM resoultion changer in the Street legal directory to use ex. 1650x1050. 
(i have used 2880x1800 on my Macbook retina!!)

To control the ENB ingame:
Shift + insert -> Activate/de-activate ENB
Scroll lock -> Activate/de-activate SweetFX (better details and lightning)
Shift F10 -> Activate/de-activate SSAO (smoother shadows on details)

If you experience heavy fps-drops. Try playing with only SweetFX and the NVIDIA application settings.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[SLRR Editor]
If you want to use a certain engine in a car that is not supported by default, you can use SLRR editor!
It is included in the Street legal dir. U need .NET framework 2.0 or higher to run it.
Fire it up, choose the street legal exe and start experimenting on your own risk!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENGINE SCRIPT]
IF the engine doesn't fit the cars engine bay, wich is quite often unfortunately. 
You can use a little trick i included. Select the screwdriver (fine tuning tool) and click 
on the engines oilpan. That lets you adjust the placement of the engine!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENGINE SOUNDS]
On the i4, i6 and stock v8 engines, you will hear different sounds depending on how the engines are tuned. 
The i4 engines offers realistic blow off valve sounds and turbo whistle aswell!

The Devils V6 and V8 have a neat little option that lets you choose different sounds. 
You choose by selecting the fine tuning tool (screw driver) 
and clicking on one of the exhaust headers on the engine.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
